description: Object that contains a physical address.

default.description: Defines if this address is the main address. In an array of addresses, only one will have this value to TRUE.

type.description: This value will be used to define a group of addresses. Multiple addresses will be able to have the same type. e.g.: Business, Home, ...

name.description: This value will be used to identify this specific address into the group. e.g.:type = business and name = office, type = business and name = billing

zip.description: The zip code or postal code.

state.description: The state, province or region name.
